title: Directx probelms

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
so i was just getting into a ranked game and the game crashes with the bugsplat popup
(i had played a few games before this)
then when i connect again it keeps getting random blackscreens where it exits and enters the game( like alttabbing)
then it crashes with the message in the picture above
im sure my driver is up to date, since i had played battlefield 1 beta a few days ago

help please

p.s sorry to my teammates in that game

edit: restarted graphics card trying custom
edit2: i can get into the game now and it has only done the blackscreen thing once, but ive only been in the custom under 5 min

do i reinstall the game to be safe?

replies.body: It sounds like your PC is failing to render the game properly, and it may be due to outdated drivers or potential hardware issues.  As a first step, make sure that your drivers as well as your Windows are up to date.  A reinstall won't necessarily fix this if your PC can't load the game.  Go through each step in the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide for instructions on that, as well as additional instructions towards resolving this.  Let me know if you have any questions!

i updated every driver i had, restarted my pc couple of times and it works now :)
thanks for the help :D
